thread.title: ALICORN Enhances Access to Virtual Primary Care Services
thread.title_full: ALICORN Enhances Access to Virtual Primary Care Services

author: Owen Jenkins
title: ALICORN Enhances Access to Virtual Primary Care Services
text: ALICORN Enhances Access to Virtual Primary Care Services [Owen Jenkins](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79249)Updated: 10-17-2024 04:40 PM ALICORN Enhances Access to Virtual Primary Care Services ALICORN members will enjoy round-the-clock, text-based healthcare services across all states. As a frontrunner in health and productivity solutions for businesses, ALICORN Inc has joined forces with Curai Health, an innovative provider in chat-first virtual care. This significant partnership aims to provide members with a durable mechanism for primary care through a dedicated physician who will oversee their healthcare journey. Comprehensive Virtual Care Offered With Curai Health's intervention, ALICORN members will have access to a personal primary care provider who will cater to their health needs over live messaging or asynchronous communication. This service includes prescription refills, lab orders, and crucial referrals, enabling thorough management of chronic conditions, including diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and mental health issues such as depression and anxiety. Members can seek urgent consultations anytime, ensuring accessibility and support. Long-Term Care Management Praveen Mooganur, CEO of ALICORN, emphasized the dire state of healthcare costs in the U.S., highlighting that a staggering 67 percent of bankruptcies stem from medical debt. In his personal experience, he witnessed the drawbacks of inadequate healthcare access. Thus, ALICORN's mission is to alleviate these challenges by providing seamless access to medical care without any direct costs. This partnership with Curai is a pivotal move toward delivering effective chronic condition management. Streamlining Healthcare Access This collaboration is poised to revolutionize the traditional model of healthcare provision. By reducing wait times for medical appointments and enhancing the quality of referrals and expedited prescriptions, ALICORN and Curai Health focus on building lasting patient-provider relationships. Such relationships foster continuous improvement in the quality of care delivered. Transforming Healthcare with AI Neal Khosla, CEO and Co-founder of Curai Health, noted that many existing digital health solutions are limited to offering episodic care. Curai stands out by accompanying patients throughout their healthcare journeys. The strategic collaboration with ALICORN marks a shared vision for providing extensive primary care, ensuring optimal health management for all members. Utilizing Advanced Technology for Better Outcomes At the forefront of health technology, Curai Health employs machine learning within clinical practices to maintain engagement with patients over time, aiming to enhance health outcomes and curtail healthcare expenses. Established in 2017, Curai has successfully provided affordable, high-quality virtual primary care, leveraging artificial intelligence to support healthcare teams led by skilled clinicians. About Curai Health Curai Health operates as a chat-first virtual clinic dedicated to democratizing healthcare access. Utilizing AI-driven solutions, it empowers trained clinicians to deliver primary care affordably. Partnerships with insurers and healthcare organizations enhance patient engagement, resulting in better health outcomes and cost savings. With backing from impressive investors, Curai has continued to innovate in the healthcare sector since its inception. About ALICORN, Inc. Founded in 2019, ALICORN focuses on solving health and productivity challenges for businesses. Their range of solutions includes advanced technology platforms, virtual care services, virtual assistants, and data analytics, all tailored to improve employee health and maximize productivity. Notable ALICORN products include CareChat™ advisor™, Birdie™, Direct™, and AVA™. Frequently Asked Questions What is the latest partnership for ALICORN? ALICORN has partnered with Curai Health to enhance virtual primary care access for its members. How will the partnership between ALICORN and Curai benefit employees? This partnership offers employees a dedicated primary care provider for continuous care without out-of-pocket costs. What services will Curai Health provide to ALICORN members? Curai Health will offer chronic condition management, urgent consultations, prescription refills, and lab orders. What does ALICORN aim to achieve with this initiative? They aim to enhance healthcare accessibility and reduce costs associated with medical care for employees. What role does technology play in this partnership? Curai utilizes advanced machine learning technology to improve patient engagement and healthcare outcomes.
